message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. What do you think?

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm a bit hesitant to pay $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $13000. What do you think?
